meanings.definition: To put food into the mouth and swallow it.
meanings.sent2: Dogs eat bones to keep their teeth strong.
meanings.sent3: I can't eat this soup with a fork!
meanings.sent4: Her words were so delicious, I wanted to eat them up.
meanings.sent5: The idea of success was a feast I couldn't wait to eat.

meanings.sent2: Birds eat seeds to stay energized.
meanings.sent3: I eat like a bear before hibernation.
meanings.sent4: His eyes seemed to eat up the entire view.
meanings.sent5: The music was so good, it felt like it could eat time itself.

meanings.sent2: Fish eat smaller fish in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: I eat knowledge like it's my favorite meal.
meanings.sent4: The city lights seemed to eat up the darkness.
meanings.sent5: His passion for music was so strong, it seemed to eat up the room.
